suggestedTasks.title: Define Precise Time Field Specification for Task Logs
suggestedTasks.description:
Clarify and document the exact meaning and representation of time fields in task logs. Determine whether the time represents task start, end, or another milestone. Create a clear specification that can be used consistently across the application's logging and reporting systems.

Key areas to address:
- Timestamp meaning (start/end/creation/modification)
- Timezone handling
- Precision of time recording
- Standardized time format
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation lacks clear time field definition

suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Task Log Time Field Logic
suggestedTasks.description:
Create comprehensive unit tests to validate time field behavior in task logging. Ensure consistent time tracking across different components and scenarios. Tests should cover edge cases like timezone transitions, millisecond precision, and different time representations.

Target files:
- marketing/src/lib/docs/loader.ts
- Any related logging/time tracking modules
suggestedTasks.reason: No existing test coverage for time field implementation

patterns: Session tracking uses JSON log format
Time fields require explicit definition and handling

documentationNeeds: Update time field specification in project documentation
Clarify time representation in task log interface
